*************
API Reference
*************

Welcome to the API reference for `private-pgm`. This section provides detailed documentation
for all the modules, classes, and functions available in the `mbi` package.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Core Modules

   dataset
   domain
   factor
   graphical_model
   synthetic_data
   estimation
   marginal_oracles
   approximate_oracles
   clique_vector
   junction_tree
   callbacks
   marginal_loss
   __init__

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Experimental Modules

   experimental_public_support
   experimental_mixture_of_products

Quick Module Overview
=====================

* :doc:`dataset`: Handles data loading and representation.
* :doc:`domain`: Manages attribute information (types, values, ranges).
* :doc:`factor`: Defines and manipulates factors in graphical models.
* :doc:`graphical_model`: Core classes for representing and working with PGMs.
* :doc:`estimation`: Parameter estimation techniques.
* :doc:`marginal_oracles`: Oracles for querying marginal distributions.
* *(Add brief descriptions for other key modules)*

For details on specific classes or functions, please navigate to the respective module page.
